title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Hawker Hurricane MK I - version 1.16
description:
In this video we will look at the Hawker Hurricane MKI which has been recently updated to a new version. This update contains some nice fixed including a button to start the engine correctly and several fixed for a gear issue and working throttle and fuel mixture.

If you also want to give this aircraft a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/23757/hawker-hurricane-mkii
